feature1.explanation: Both texts use commas and periods consistently.

feature2.explanation: Text 1 is more formal and structured with standard grammar, while Text 2 includes more informal language and unconventional grammar choices.

feature3.explanation: Both texts have short sentence lengths and straightforward structures.

feature4.explanation: Text 1 has a formal and neutral tone, while Text 2 has a more expressive and opinionated tone.

feature5.explanation: Both texts are free from spelling and typographical errors.

overall.explanation: While some features like punctuation and lack of errors align, differences in lexical choice, sentence structure, and tone indicate a lower likelihood of the same author.
